title: Golden Circle Adventure

image.alt: Stunning view of Gullfoss waterfall, a major highlight of the Golden Circle route

quote.text: The Gullfoss waterfall was the most beautiful and powerful demonstration of the force of nature I've seen in my entire life.
quote.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

summary: A day exploring Iceland's famous Golden Circle route, featuring the historic Þingvellir National Park, active geysers at Geysir, the magnificent Gullfoss waterfall, and a rejuvenating hike to natural hot springs at Reykjadalur.

schedule.title: Breakfast at Hotel Fron
schedule.description: Enjoy an early breakfast at the hotel (included with your stay) to get a head start on the day.

schedule.title: Drive to Þingvellir National Park
schedule.description: Depart Reykjavík early to beat the crowds heading to the national park.

schedule.title: Explore Þingvellir National Park
schedule.description: Walk through the rift valley where the North American and Eurasian tectonic plates meet. Visit the site of the world's first parliament.

schedule.title: Drive to Geysir Geothermal Area
schedule.description: Continue along the Golden Circle route to the famous geysers.

schedule.title: Geysir Geothermal Area
schedule.description: Watch the Strokkur geyser erupt every 5-10 minutes, reaching heights of 15-20 meters.

schedule.title: Drive to Gullfoss Waterfall
schedule.description: Short drive to Iceland's most famous waterfall.

schedule.title: Gullfoss Waterfall
schedule.description: Experience the powerful two-tiered waterfall with walking paths offering different perspectives.

schedule.title: Lunch at Gullfoss Café
schedule.description: Enjoy traditional Icelandic lamb soup or other local dishes with a view of the waterfall.

schedule.title: Drive to Friðheimar
schedule.description: Head to a geothermal-powered tomato farm and restaurant.

schedule.title: Friðheimar Tomato Farm
schedule.description: Tour the greenhouse and learn about sustainable agriculture in Iceland.

schedule.title: Drive to Reykjadalur Thermal River
schedule.description: Drive to the trailhead for the hot spring hike.

schedule.title: Reykjadalur Hot Spring Hike
schedule.description: Moderate 3km (each way) hike through a geothermal area to a natural hot river. Bring swimwear and towels.

schedule.title: Drive to Selfoss
schedule.description: Final stretch of driving to your accommodation.

schedule.title: Dinner in Selfoss
schedule.description: Enjoy dinner at Tryggvaskáli, a historic restaurant by the river.

highlights.title: Þingvellir National Park
highlights.description: UNESCO World Heritage site where you can walk between two continents and see the world's oldest democratic parliament site.

highlights.title: Geysir Geothermal Area
highlights.description: Active geysers including Strokkur which erupts every 5-10 minutes, shooting water up to 30 meters into the air.

highlights.title: Gullfoss Waterfall
highlights.description: Powerful two-tiered waterfall where the Hvítá river plunges into a 32-meter deep crevice.

highlights.title: Friðheimar Greenhouse
highlights.description: Sustainable tomato farm using geothermal energy, offering tours and delicious tomato-based meals.

highlights.title: Reykjadalur Hot Spring River
highlights.description: Natural hot river where you can bathe in geothermally heated water surrounded by stunning Icelandic landscape.

accommodation.name: Country Dream Guesthouse
accommodation.notes: Small family-run guesthouse with a homey atmosphere and good location for Golden Circle exploration

alternatives.title: Secret Lagoon
alternatives.description: Natural hot spring pool with 38-40°C water temperature, less crowded alternative to Blue Lagoon.

alternatives.title: Kerid Crater
alternatives.description: Volcanic crater lake with vibrant blue water contrasting against red volcanic rock.

alternatives.title: Fontana Geothermal Baths
alternatives.description: Series of interconnected mineral baths and steam rooms built over a natural hot spring.

alternatives.title: Brúarfoss Waterfall
alternatives.description: Hidden bright blue waterfall requiring a 7km roundtrip hike on a mostly flat trail.

alternatives.title: Þingvallavatn Lake
alternatives.description: Snorkeling or diving in the crystal clear waters between tectonic plates (guided tour required).

badWeatherAlternatives.title: Laugarvatn Fontana Geothermal Spa
badWeatherAlternatives.description: Indoor and outdoor geothermal baths with steam rooms and sauna.

badWeatherAlternatives.title: Friðheimar Tomato Farm Extended Visit
badWeatherAlternatives.description: Longer visit including lunch in their greenhouse restaurant.

badWeatherAlternatives.title: Flúðir Swimming Pool
badWeatherAlternatives.description: Indoor and outdoor pools with hot tubs in a small village.

badWeatherAlternatives.title: Selfoss Swimming Pool
badWeatherAlternatives.description: Modern swimming facility with indoor and outdoor pools and hot tubs.

tip: Start early to beat the crowds at Þingvellir and Geysir. The Gullfoss waterfall has two parking lots - the upper one gives a panoramic view while the lower one brings you closer to the falls.
notes: The Reykjadalur hot spring hike is moderately challenging with some elevation gain. Bring swimwear, towels, and water shoes for the hot river. There may be limited privacy for changing clothes at the river, so consider wearing swimwear under your clothes. Check weather conditions before starting the hike.
